channel.title: Dont you hate those people that
channel.description:
Lie About thereself to make them seem cool?
post some examples
This kid name Drew in my Business Technology Class says he has been chased by the FBI and cops for possession of crack-cocaine. He ALso says he went into his attic when the SWAT was breaking into his house to get his M16 and AK-47

item.title: Dont you hate those people that
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Yes but if you think about it, everyone lies for effect.

Read full topic

marcbob:

EVERYDAY IM LIKE AMG IM BREAKING THE LAW WHEN I GO ON MOPARSCAPE AND I JIZZ

item.title: Dont you hate those people that
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

You are very childish stupid and block headed…If u wanna know my achievements Here are just some of them… I was programing computer at the age of 6 and built my first computer at the age of 7 though the years I have done web programing for people, designed my own programs, I have help design and program games for Sony and EA Games, was on of the programmers for the Anti-virus Avast witch is way better then Norton I might add, I have Designed programs for Apple, I have fought Leukemia at the age of 14 and beat it, and used my make a wish to meet bill gates and He said I was a Genius and Hired me at the age of 16 and I am currently almost ready to retire at the age of 25 with two homes one three million dollar home in Washington And One one 2.5 Million dollar home in Hawaii. Well there u go I’m tired and g2 bed P.S I’m going to ignore u now I don’t like to talk to people who act Childish I’ve got better things to do then to talk to a sad and pathetic person like you…

I’ve seen that somewhere…

Read full topic

Some douche bag told everyone he had a handgun in his bag to seem cool, one of them nerd rage kids. The staff got on to him and searched his bag and it turned out he had no handgun, just a sad attempt to get attention.

@Mitko wrote:

Same here towriss. I have 3 fucktards in my class which i know for 8 years, now that we’re in 9th grade (new school) they keep lieing my classmates about the same stuff, they claim they party every night, smoke crack, sometimes they pretend they’re drunk in the morning when they arrive there, etc… Just ignore.

I actualy laugh.
